summary: Watch: BTS And Park Bo Gum Have Fun In The Sun Together In Summery Ad
title: Watch: BTS And Park Bo Gum Have Fun In The Sun Together In Summery Ad
body:
Watch: BTS And Park Bo Gum Have Fun In The Sun Together In Summery Ad

BTS and Park Bo Gum teamed up for a Coca-Cola commercial!

On June 28, Coca-Cola shared a new ad that’s perfect for the season! It features the dream team of BTS and Park Bo Gum as they find ways to escape the sweltering heat together.

Check it out below!

In addition to this latest collaboration for Coca-Cola, Park Bo Gum recently…

View On WordPress

summary: So you know how teenage girls are like obsessed with BTS and stuff? I headcanon that Peter, Ned and Harley are the same way, but...
body: So you know how teenage girls are like obsessed with BTS and stuff? I headcanon that Peter, Ned and Harley are the same way, but with BlackPink. Like they fanboy over the group all the time. Tony, Aunt May and Pepper are so confused.

summary: The unpopular opinion anon... Neither their sexualities bother me... It is just I think that from my observation of him... And...
question: The unpopular opinion anon... Neither their sexualities bother me... It is just I think that from my observation of him... And when I stated that I got attacked by so many people like... It is somethink wrong to be straight...
answer:
I think people have started fetisizing the boys being together sexually so much that they can’t think of anything other then them being gay.
Or they just don’t like the idea about them being straight because the girl they are going to date is not going to be them.
Its like a fantasy land people have created.
Whatever their sexuality is how is it going to affect anyone like their personal life is supposed to be private and as fans we should know our limits.

reblog.comment:

Whatever their sexuality is how is it going to affect anyone like their personal life is supposed to be private and as fans we should know our limits.

I think people have started fetisizing the boys being together sexually so much that they can’t think of anything other then them being gay.

Its like a fantasy land people have created.
Whatever their sexuality is how is it going to affect anyone like their personal life is supposed to be private and as fans we should know our limits.

tags: honestly i just wanted his full speech on my blog
i feel like there was probably some kind of word play going on with the moon thing? but idk
gonna go back into my cave now
summary: We really worked hard. When we were sad, we were really sad. And when we were happy, we were tearfully happy. These emotions...
caption: We really worked hard. When we were sad, we were really sad. And when we were happy, we were tearfully happy. These emotions contained pain, sadness, and happiness. We used all our strength to hold onto these emotions and lived through it. That’s why we are so happy. I am so happy to think that “ah, we only did five years.” It’s unfortunate that as time flows, many things change, and there are things changing. Anyway, we will protect everything that we think is precious and we will work hard to change. So please continue looking after us. There are so many things I want to say…what more can I say? I was so happy to have this opportunity to meet you guys during these five years and I love you.

reblog.comment: We really worked hard. When we were sad, we were really sad. And when we were happy, we were tearfully happy. These emotions contained pain, sadness, and happiness. We used all our strength to hold onto these emotions and lived through it. That’s why we are so happy. I am so happy to think that “ah, we only did five years.” It’s unfortunate that as time flows, many things change, and there are things changing. Anyway, we will protect everything that we think is precious and we will work hard to change. So please continue looking after us. There are so many things I want to say…what more can I say? I was so happy to have this opportunity to meet you guys during these five years and I love you.

trail.content_raw: We really worked hard. When we were sad, we were really sad. And when we were happy, we were tearfully happy. These emotions contained pain, sadness, and happiness. We used all our strength to hold onto these emotions and lived through it. That’s why we are so happy. I am so happy to think that “ah, we only did five years.” It’s unfortunate that as time flows, many things change, and there are things changing. Anyway, we will protect everything that we think is precious and we will work hard to change. So please continue looking after us. There are so many things I want to say…what more can I say? I was so happy to have this opportunity to meet you guys during these five years and I love you.
trail.content: We really worked hard. When we were sad, we were really sad. And when we were happy, we were tearfully happy. These emotions contained pain, sadness, and happiness. We used all our strength to hold onto these emotions and lived through it. That’s why we are so happy. I am so happy to think that “ah, we only did five years.” It’s unfortunate that as time flows, many things change, and there are things changing. Anyway, we will protect everything that we think is precious and we will work hard to change. So please continue looking after us. There are so many things I want to say…what more can I say? I was so happy to have this opportunity to meet you guys during these five years and I love you.

blog.name: ao3feed-yoonkook
blog.title: From afar, I steal glances; if we touch hands, will I lose you?
blog.description: This blog is an AUTOMATED blog that uses an IFTTT algorithm to instantly post fics posted under the relationship: Jeon Jungkook/Min Yoongi | Suga tag on ao3. The owner of this blog (hoseokie-jung) only logs in to delete things that don't belong (rp requests, other ships, etc) once every couple of months because she has a terrible memory and forgets that this is, in fact, her blog.

title: I Know.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KnR2gg

by Vminkookstolemysuga

Yoongi and Jeongguk can’t be together even though they wanted it so bad. They are the star crossed lovers that no one wants to be. They spoke through silent conversations and song recommendations. They couldn’t be together but Jeongguk planned one night for them. One night for them to love each other openly.

Words: 1996, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 방탄소년단 | Bangtan Boys | BTS
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Jeon Jungkook, Min Yoongi | Suga
  • Relationships: Jeon Jungkook/Min Yoongi | Suga
  • Additional Tags: yoonkook, star crossed lovers, secret loves, fluff and sadness, this might make you cry, but its so sweet, yoongi is whipped, Jungkook is whipped, Tears, Emotional Jungkook, Emotional Yoongi, a very indie story, brief mentions of other members, Gay Love, SOFT GAYS, yoongi is soft, Jungkook is soft, probably softer, Sugakookie, soft, Fluff and Hurt/Comfort


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KnR2gg

blog.name: hisheartsmile
blog.title: ☀️ i love the sun ☀
blog.description: ֎라우 ֎ Hoseok's wife here ֎ OT7 ֎ Jihope is my religion ֎ ֎beyond the quotes ֎ m.list | cold shower ֎ i sometimes make shitty edits ֎

title: cold shower
body:
Character: Yoongi

Genre: Light angst

Word count: 866

“I cried while taking a shower. Not because I was overjoyed, but because I was scared. I mean, I was like… It was beyond what I had imagined. In a way, I wouldn’t have even dared to dream it. During the shower, I felt pressured and I felt lost about what to do from then on.” - Min Yoongi, BTS Festa 2018.

The only thing Yoongi wants to do now is to take a shower and go to sleep. He’s had a really good time at the American Music Awards, but he’s exhausted. He wonders what would he have done if they’d gone to the afterparty, because doing so many interviews and performing has drained his energy completely. It’s a relief that at least Namjoon is fluent in English. Even if he doesn’t tell him very often, Yoongi is actually very thankful to the leader.

Yoongi goes to the bathroom and looks at himself in the mirror. At first, he’s surprised. He’d expected to see bags under his eyes and a grumpy face because of the tiredness, but instead he finds his mirrored-self with a gummy smile. And this is when he realises how happy he is.“We’ve done it,” he thinks, “BTS has done it again”.

Without being able to contain it, a gleeful chuckle bursts from his lips. He remembers the exact moment the members got out of the limo and saw their ARMYs screaming their names. He can’t express with words how that moment felt. Yoongi was expecting them to be there, of course, but he was so nervous, that his hands were sweaty and trembling and the only thing which had helped him calm himself down had been the ARMYs’ cheers. The rapper realises once again how much he appreciates his fans. Thanks to them, BTS has been able to attend the AMAS, where they got to meet a lot of the artists they admire, and they even got to perform. How can this be real?

Yoongi closes his eyes, the gummy smile much broader now, and sees clearly the sea of ARMY bombs, the excitement on his managers’ faces, the happiness of the members… He feels a light ache on his chest when he remembers once again the loud fanchants. He can’t believe this is happening to them, they are making their dreams a reality. They are experiencing things they never even believed they could do.

Shaking his head, Yoongi wishes his thoughts wouldn’t distract him so much. He takes off his clothes, puting them on the toilet, and then he steps into the shower and turns on the tap. The feeling of the warm water on his skin has always relaxed him, however, this time, the water is almost ice cold. Yoongi gasps, not having expected this, and plays desperately with the faucet. But it’s quite difficult since the water pours down his face and it forces him to close his eyes. A minute later he starts to suspect there is no hot water at all, so he gives up. Nevertheless, instead of stepping out of the shower, he remains there.

And then, unexpectedly, Yoongi bursts into tears. He doesn’t understand what’s happening or why he has suddenly started to cry, but he feels a deep pressure on his chest. His warm tears mingle with the cold drops of water now. While trying not to fall because of the lack of strength in his legs and the slippery surface, Yoongi covers his mouth with his hands. He doesn’t want anyone to hear him cry. He is scared, he does know that. But why is he feeling like this after such a great day? He pictures the members on a stage, all the seats taken by ARMYs, the music resonating with them… And Yoongi realises he feels lost. His shoulders shake since his sobbing is increasing. What are they supposed to do? They have achieved so many things, Yoongi thinks it’s too much. They are now worldwide artists, millions of eyes are on the group, watching every single one of their steps. What if one of these is the wrong one? What if, after going all the way up, they fall and disappoint those who expect a lot from them? He knows this is going to happen, of course. It is inevitable. But God, does it scare him. He wishes he could go up on the stage for many years more. Yoongi loves to be there with the seven members and sing, dance and rap with them. He is not ready to say goodbye to this. He doesn’t think he’ll ever be.

Yoongi doesn’t know how much time he spends in the shower, but when he feels less pressured, he finally washes himself and steps out. After he’s put on his pajamas, Yoongi lies on the cozy bed, staring at the ceiling. He lets out a sigh, his thoughts still lingering in his head. He has to admit he feels a bit better now, though. At the end of the day, Yoongi’s always known that accomplishing so many things would be a little too much for him. It’s good that he’s finally accepted it; what’s more, this has helped him realise he mustn’t let his fear win. Instead, he must challenge himself: practice more, improve his rapping, try new things, explore other music genres… Only by working harder BTS will, once again, make history. And now Yoongi knows what he has to do. He knows it won’t be an easy way, but he’s sure someday he’ll learn to completely believe in himself, to love himself.


Masterlist

He doesn’t think he’ll ever be.
